definition.procedurexml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="seconds" type="Number">seconds</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="0" y="0"><field name="trigger">player_ticks</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment h="149" pinned="false" w="667">Just like hunger, thirst has a a number from 0-4 that calculates when to deduct a point of hydration.

Doing nothing, this number is added by 0.001 per tick [0.02 per second] or 1 hunger is reduced per 200 seconds
Burning/sprinting/flying expends an extra 0.1 per tick (2 per second) or  1 hunger is reduced per 2 seconds
If in a warm biome, another 0.01*(Biome Temp) is added per tick
For dessert(2.0 temp): 0.01*2.0 per tick (0.2 per second) or  1 hunger is reduced per 10 seconds
For savvanah(1.0 temp): 0.01*1.0 per tick (0.1 per second) or  1 hunger is reduced per 20 seconds</comment><value name="IF0"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_checkgamemode"><field name="gamemode">SURVIVAL</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="world_data_logic_getgamerule"><field name="gamerulesboolean">CUSTOM:Hydration</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="world_data_checkdifficulty"><field name="difficulty">PEACEFUL</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="entity_haspotioneffect"><field name="potion">CUSTOM:Refreshed</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LTE</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="true" is_player_var="true"/><field name="VAR">global:Thirstlevel</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_deal_custom_damage"><value name="damage_number"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="localization_text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">dehydration</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
